attributes.action: Fix the roof on our sports centre and install a ventilation system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Scott Hall sports centre in Leeds has been waiting years for the local council to fix a leaky roof and install a ventilation system both above the main sports hall. 
The hall is used by children and adults 
including elderly for general keep fit classes, badminton, football, circuit training, boxercise, pilates and
martial arts (to name but a few).

When it rains we all have to avoid various islands of buckets and cones in the main sports hall. 
Despite the staff trying their best to cordon off areas water invariably makes its way across large parts of the hall. 
When it is hot the classes being taken become intolerable. There is no fresh air being supplied to the hall despite groups containing 30-40 people.

Both issues are clearly not something a visitor would expect to contend with,
especially after paying £3 an hour for
a training session.

Please arrange for the roof to be fixed and for a fresh air system to be installed in the main hall.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
